fields.description: Includes research computing and data staffing, outreach, and advanced support, as well as support in the management of the research lifecycle.
Includes data creation; data discovery and collection; data analysis and visualization; research data curation, storage, backup, preservation, and transfer; and research data policy compliance.

Includes software package management, research software development, research software optimization or troubleshooting, workflow engineering, containers and cloud computing, securing access to software, and software associated with physical specimens.
Includes infrastructure systems, systems operations, and systems security and compliance.
Includes RCD leadership, institutional alignment, culture for research support, funding, and partnerships and engagement with external communities.
